amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Operation of the National Park System Everglades Restoration by $1 million and reduces funding for Environmental Programs and Management by $1.250 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Operation of the National Park System Everglades Restoration by 1 million and reduce funding for Environmental Programs and Management by 1,250,000 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Clawson (FL).
